5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever eats from this plant; garlic, let him not annoy us with it in this mosque of ours.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَكَلَ الثُّومَ فَلاَ يَقْرَبَنَّ الْمَسْجِدَ
chapter.eng-name: “Whoever eats garlic, let him not come near the mosque”
